mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND t.deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.sort_order ASC, t.created_at DESC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND t.deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.milestone_id = #{milestoneId} AND t.deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.assignee_id = #{assigneeId} AND t.deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.end_date ASC, t.priority DESC
SELECT t.status, COUNT(*) as count FROM task t WHERE t.department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND t.deleted = 0 GROUP BY t.status
SELECT t.status, COUNT(*) as count FROM task t WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND t.deleted = 0 GROUP BY t.status
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET progress = #{progress}, progress_note = #{progressNote}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE task SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.assignee_id = #{userId} AND t.deleted = 0 AND t.status IN ('pending', 'in_progress') ORDER BY t.end_date ASC, t.priority DESC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.deleted = 0 AND t.status IN ('pending', 'in_progress') AND t.end_date BETWEEN CURDATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) ORDER BY t.end_date ASC
SELECT t.* FROM task t WHERE t.deleted = 0 AND t.status IN ('pending', 'in_progress') AND t.end_date < CURDATE() ORDER BY t.end_date ASC
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(progress), 0) FROM task WHERE department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND deleted = 0
SELECT COALESCE(AVG(progress), 0) FROM task WHERE milestone_id = #{milestoneId} AND deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND deleted = 0 AND status = 'completed'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE department_task_id = #{departmentTaskId} AND deleted = 0
